title: Limits an insurer's reduction of coverage by limiting the volume of notices of intention to four percent, establishes standards for definitions; repealer
summary: Limits the scope of an insurer's reduction of coverage by limiting the volume of notices of intention to not renew or condition renewal to four percent of the total number of covered policies within such insurer's rating territory in this state.

       AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to limiting the scope  of
         an insurer's reduction of insurance coverage by limiting the volume of
         notices of intention to not renew or condition renewal to four percent
         of  the  total  number  of  covered  policies of such insurer's rating
         territory; and in relation to establishing standards  for  definitions
